data.eml:eml: A description of Macrobiotus horningi sp. nov. and redescriptions of M. maculatus comb. nov. Iharos, 1973 and M. rawsoni Horning et al., 1978 (Tardigrada: Eutardigrada: Macrobiotidae: hufelandi group)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kaczmarek, Łukasz, Michalczyk, Łukasz (2017): A description of Macrobiotus horningi sp. nov. and redescriptions of M. maculatus comb. nov. Iharos, 1973 and M. rawsoni Horning et al., 1978 (Tardigrada: Eutardigrada: Macrobiotidae: hufelandi group). Zootaxa 4363 (1): 79-100, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4363.1.3
